title: Help Center / Do you have to be licensed in Florida to practice alternative medicine such as Naturopathy or Homeopathy?
cleaned_text: Only physicians licensed in Florida can include or offer alternative medicine to their patients. The definition of "practice of medicine" is listed in s. 458.305, Florida Statutes: the diagnosis, treatment, operation, or prescription for any human disease, pain, injury, deformity or other physical or mental condition.
